index.title: CV-agir
index.desc: A resume generator that allows you to create, edit, and download resumes for free.
index.author: Arsen G.

ai.work-exp-msg:
Please provide the work experience from the following description:
     {description}
ai.experience-msg:
Job: {job} at {company} from {startDate} to {endDate}

Job Description: {jobInfo}
ai.edu-msg: Degree: {degree} at "{school}", Faculty of "{faculty}" from {startDate} to {endDate}

not-found.title: Oops, Page not found
not-found.desc: The page you are looking for was not found. It may have been deleted, moved, renamed, or doesn't exist at all.

titles.resume: Are you sure you want to delete the resume?

titles.cancel-sub: Are you sure you want to cancel your subscription?
titles.payment-method: Are you sure you want to delete this payment method?
